# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#F_Budget = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Facts/F_Budget.parquet', format='parquet')
#F_Budget.createOrReplaceTempView("F_Budget")

#Dim_DATE = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Dimensions/DIM_DATES.parquet', format='parquet')
#Dim_DATE.createOrReplaceTempView("Dim_DATE")

#F_TRANSACTIONS = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Facts/F_TRANSACTIONS.parquet', format='parquet')
#F_TRANSACTIONS.createOrReplaceTempView("F_TRANSACTIONS")

BUDGETTMP = spark.sql("""
SELECT AcctCode as `System_Account_Code`,
	   Company,
       if(Name = 'Main Budget 2016', 'Main Budget 2017',Name) as `Budget_Name`, 
       sum(CredSTotal) as `Credit_Total`, 
       sum(DebSTotal) as `Debit_Total`, 
       Year(FinancYear) + 1 as `Fin_Year`, 
       sum(`Monthly_CredSTotal`)*-1 as `Monthly_Credit_Total`, 
       sum(`Monthly_DebSTotal`) as `Monthly_Debit_Total`, 
       FinMonth + 1 as `Fin_MonthNo`, 
       MonthPrcnt as `Month_Percent_Budget`
FROM F_Budget
Where Name IN('Main Budget 2016', 'Main Budget 2017')
group by AcctCode,
		 Company,
		 Name,
		 FinancYear,
		 FinMonth,
		 MonthPrcnt
""")
#BUDGETTMP.show()
BUDGETTMP.createOrReplaceTempView("BUDGETTMP")

BUDGETTMP = spark.sql("""
SELECT bgt.*,
       sum(`Working_Day`) as `Working_Days_in_Month`
FROM BUDGETTMP bgt
LEFT JOIN Dim_DATE d 
       ON bgt.Fin_Year = d.Fin_Year
      AND bgt.Fin_MonthNo = d.Fin_MonthNo
GROUP BY bgt.System_Account_Code,
         bgt.Company,
         bgt.Budget_Name,
         bgt.Credit_Total,
         bgt.Debit_Total,
         bgt.Fin_Year,
         bgt.Monthly_Credit_Total,
         bgt.Monthly_Debit_Total,
         bgt.Fin_MonthNo,
         bgt.Month_Percent_Budget,
         Posting_Date
""")
#BUDGETTMP.show()
BUDGETTMP.createOrReplaceTempView("BUDGETTMP")
## NEED TO JOIN COMPLETED TRANSACTIONS IN HERE ON THE BUDGET
